## Bubble.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `Bubble` class

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(workspace: WorkspaceSvg, content: SVGElement, shape: SVGElement, anchorXY: Coordinate, bubbleWidth: number | null, bubbleHeight: number | null);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  workspace | [WorkspaceSvg](./blockly.workspacesvg_class.md) | The workspace on which to draw the bubble. |
|  content | SVGElement | SVG content for the bubble. |
|  shape | SVGElement | SVG element to avoid eclipsing. |
|  anchorXY | [Coordinate](./blockly.utils_namespace.coordinate_class.md) | Absolute position of bubble's anchor point. |
|  bubbleWidth | number \| null | Width of bubble, or null if not resizable. |
|  bubbleHeight | number \| null | Height of bubble, or null if not resizable. |
